price: 33. ¡Oh, creyentes!, obedezcan a Al-lah y a Su Mensajero y no echen a perder sus (buenas) acciones.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla walā tub'ṭilū aʿmālakum
